tracetool
Interface ITracePLugin

public interface ITracePLugin

Plugin interface.

Method Summary
 java.lang.String getPlugName()
          Get the plugin name.

          Called when a node is to be deleted on a WinTrace.

Method Detail

getPlugName

java.lang.String getPlugName()
Get the plugin name.

Returns:
plugin name

onAction

boolean onAction(java.lang.String winId,
                 int resourceId,
                 java.lang.String nodeId)
Called when the user click on a button, label or menu on a WinTrace. The plugin must call WinTrace.LinkToPlugin in order to receive this event

Parameters:
winId - Wintrace Id
resourceId - Resource Id
nodeId - Node id of the current selected trace (can be empty)
Returns:
when true : tracetool perform the default action when false : tracetool don't perform any action

onBeforeDelete

boolean onBeforeDelete(java.lang.String winId,
                       java.lang.String nodeId)
Called when a node is to be deleted on a WinTrace. The plugin must call WinTrace.LinkToPlugin in order to receive this event

Parameters:
winId - Wintrace Id
nodeId - Node Id
Returns:
when true : tracetool delete the node when false : tracetool don't delete the node

onTimer

void onTimer()
Called every 500 ms. Can be used for example to refresh labels The plugin must call LinkToPlugin in order to receive this event

start

void start()
Initialise the plugin.

stop

void stop()
Stop the plugin.
